resources.string: Welcome to Terp Tasker! We\'ll help organize your time and keep you on track. Swipe over to learn more and get started!
If you haven\'t already, head over to \n www.TerpTasker.com \n on a computer to create an account and get started. Then head back to the app.
Once you log in, swipe in from the left to view your calendar, tasks, and notification settings.
